QuestData.Title: Stone Soup
QuestData.Description: On the surface of the rock you find carvings of what you make out to be ingredients.$b$bIf you find the ingredients, perhaps you can make the troggs' soup for yourself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the ingredients for Stone Soup in Mistfall Cleft.
QuestData.CompletionText: The flavor of the soup doesn't seem quite right. It must be missing ingredients.
QuestData.RewardText: The soup has somehow taken on a somewhat floral quality. It feels well-balanced on the tongue and goes down very smoothly.$b$bThis may be, in fact, the most delicious cuisine you have ever tasted.
